articles.title: How safe is your hospital? These states rank best and worst for care. - USA TODAY
articles.description: The report assigns letter grades "A" through "F" based on how well hospitals protect patients from errors, accidents, injuries and infections.
articles.content:
Doctors and nurses working in hospitals across the country are sharing the realities of COVID-19.
USA TODAY
